DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study Ceftaroline Fosamil/Avibactam Adults With Augmented Renal Clearance
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate single-dose pharmacokinetic ( PK ) profile ceftaroline avibactam follow intravenous ( IV ) administration ceftaroline fosamil/avibactam ( `` CXL '' ) adult augment renal clearance ( ARC ) .
DOC.criteria: Male female adult ≥ 18 ≤ 55 year old Augmented renal clearance , define : Estimated CrCl ≥ 115 mL/min ( calculate use modify CockcroftGault , measure 8hour urine collection ) Measured CrCl ≥ 140 mL/min ( 8hour urine collection ) Hospitalized diagnosed SIRS , define least 2 follow : Temperature ( oral , rectal , tympanic , core ) > 38.5°C < 35.0°C Heart rate > 90 beats/min Respiratory rate > 20 breaths/min PaCO2 < 32 mmHg Leukocytosis ( > 12,000 white blood cell [ WBC ] /mm3 ) , leukopenia ( < 4000 WBC/mm3 ) , bandemia ( > 10 % immature neutrophils [ band ] regardless total peripheral WBC ) Requires indwell urinary bladder catheter per standard care ( end 8hour urine collection ) History know hypersensitivity allergic reaction cephalosporin βlactam antimicrobial ( eg , penicillin ) History chronic kidney disease , hemodialysis , peritoneal dialysis ; history acute renal replacement therapy ( eg , hemodialysis , hemofiltration ) associate current illness Suspected rhabdomyolysis creatine kinase > 10,000 U/L Significant anemia define hemoglobin < 9 g/dL hematocrit < 27 % Transfusion pack red blood cell ( PRBC ) whole blood within 24 hour study drug infusion anticipate need transfusion last PK blood sample collect If female , currently pregnant breastfeeding
